alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 9:33PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY WET SNOW WILL AFFECT EAST CENTRAL STILLWATER...NORTH CENTRAL CARBON AND SOUTHWESTERN YELLOWSTONE COUNTIES... At 932 PM MDT, an area of heavy wet snow was located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Billings Heights to near Laurel to near Fromberg. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. Visibility under a mile is possible along with slushy snow accumulations of an inch or less. Locations impacted include... Billings, Laurel, Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Lockwood, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Huntley, Edgar, Boyd, Roberts, Silesia, Acton, Park City and Rockvale. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone
